H3.text: who were the bands in pitch perfect 3. Saddle Up

A4.text: Evermoist is a band featured in Pitch Perfect 3, with members including Calamity, Serenity, Veracity, and Charity.

A5.text: Whiskey Shivers appears as the group Saddle Up in Pitch Perfect 3.

A6.text: DJ Khaled appeared in Pitch Perfect 3 as a fictionalized version of himself.
